alert.note: Alert for Rock; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Walworth and northeastern Rock Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elkhorn to 6 miles northwest of Darien. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitewater, Elkhorn, Delavan, Milton, East Troy, Lake Koshkonong, Richmond, La Grange, Abells Corners, Tibbets, Millard, Avalon, Emerald Grove, Johnstown Center, Troy Center, and Lima Center. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 320 and 323. Wisconsin Highway 26 between mile markers 8 and 13. Interstate 43 between mile markers 22 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
